August 28, 2012

Evansville, a look back…

I spent the formative years of my higher education career as a junior faculty member to Program Chair for the Community College in Evansville, Indiana. Evansville was and is a great little town that grew significantly during my time there; however, if you really want to see how it has changed over the years, check out the video below in this post. I just love these old pictures.
